UPDATE car_model_simple
id = #{id},
brand_id = #{brandId},
mfrs_id = #{mfrsId},
series_id = #{seriesId},
sub_name = #{subName},
model_name = #{modelName},
extra_name = #{extraName},

fuel_consumption_test = #{fuelConsumptionTest},
warranty = #{warranty},

doors = #{doors},

fuel_tank = #{fuelTank},
trunk = #{trunk},
trunk_total = #{trunkTotal},
drag_coefficient = #{dragCoefficient},
car_fuel_type_id = #{carFuelTypeId},
car_fuel_number_id = #{carFuelNumberId},
engine_model_name = #{engineModelName},
engine_id = #{engineId},

engine_position = #{enginePosition},

baby_seat_id = #{babySeatId},
